column1: I wonder how Penny is doing? Maybe I'll give her a call later today.
column2: 我很好奇佩妮怎麼樣了？也許等一下我會打給她。

column1: I was just daydreaming... do you think MARILDA is okay? I hope she finds some place where she truly belongs...
column2: 我只是在幻想……你覺得瑪麗爾達還好嗎？我希望她能找到她真正屬於的地方……

column1: Hey! I had trouble sleeping last night so I fiddled around in my workshop for a bit. Here, I made this for you. [688 369 338 325 287]
column2: 嘿！我昨天有點失眠，所以我在我的工作間弄了一會。看，這是我為你準備的。[688 369 338 325 287]

column1: I hope you can find some use for it.
column2: 我希望你能用得上。

column1: The only thing I dislike about rain is the fact that I can't do any stargazing!
column2: 我唯一不喜歡雨天的一點是我看不到星星！

column1: Do I hear a leak in the roof? I'll have to check it out. I know a thing or two about carpentry from watching my mother.
column2: 我是聽到屋頂在漏水嗎？我要檢查一下。我從看我媽媽工作學了一點木匠活。

column1: Make sure you don't leave your tools out in the rain! You wouldn't want them to get all rusty.
column2: 別讓工具淋在雨裡！要是它們生鏽就不好辦了。

column1: I'm not sure what this is, yet... but it's fun to turn the old wrench now and then.
column2: 目前我還不能確定這是什麼……但是不時轉一下這個舊扳手還蠻有趣的。

column1: Hi @. How was your day... soggy?
column2: 嗨，@。這麼潮濕……你今天過得怎麼樣？

column1: This weather gives me gadget ideas... maybe if I funnel the rainwater it could power a mill?
column2: 這天氣讓我想到一些關於小東西的點子……如果我把雨水集中起來，或許可以推動一個磨坊？

column1: Dad's been tracking the weather patterns for the last twenty years.
column2: 爸爸追蹤了過去二十年的天氣規律。

column1: It's a little too early to tell, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
column2: 現在說有點太早了，但是結果顯示了一些反常趨勢。

column1: Can we have spaghetti in bed tonight?
column2: 今天我們可以在床上吃義大利麵條嗎？

column1: I made some dessert! Make sure to brush your teeth before bed, though. [232 234 223 220]
column2: 我做了一些點心！但是在上床前記得刷牙。[232 234 223 220]

column1: My day wasn't all that exciting... I stayed inside because of the weather.
column2: 今天我過得平淡無常……因為天氣的緣故，我一直待在屋子裡。

column1: It was relaxing, though. I kicked back with the latest 'Schematics Weekly'.
column2: 但是我很放鬆。閱讀最新一期的「每週圖表」又讓我心情好起來了。

column1: Hmm? Sorry, sometimes I get so lost in thought that I don't even realize what I'm doing.
column2: 嗯？抱歉，有時候我會沉浸在自己的思緒裡，甚至沒有意識到自己在做什麼。

column1: I found this in my scrap pile. Think you could find a use for it? [286 287 205 732]
column2: 我在廢料堆裡找到了這個。你覺得能把它派上用場嗎？[286 287 205 732]

column1: Finally, you're up! I was getting so hungry... *rumble*
column2: 你終於起床了！我好餓……*肚子咕咕叫*

column1: One of the best things about living on the farm is waking up to a chorus of songbirds.
column2: 生活在農場最棒的事情之一就是早上在鳥兒的歌聲中醒來。

column1: How do you keep your hands so soft with all that farmwork?
column2: 你是怎麼在做了那麼多農事的情況下還讓手保持柔軟的？

column1: Did you see the moon tonight? It always looks spectacular on the horizon.
column2: 今晚你看到月光了嗎？在地平線上月亮看起來很壯觀。

column1: I saw a shooting star earlier. I like to pretend it's MARILDA stopping by to check on us.
column2: 我之前看到過流星。我喜歡假裝是瑪麗爾達過來巡視我們。

column1: I can't decide if I'm craving chocolate cake or ripe strawberries. Or maybe both...?
column2: 我決定不了是想吃巧克力蛋糕還是熟草莓。或者都想……？

column1: Be honest... am I gaining weight?
column2: 說實話……我是正在長胖嗎？

column1: You did good work today! You deserve to relax the rest of the evening.
column2: 你今天做得不錯！晚上的剩餘時間你應該放鬆一下。

column1: I'm really starting to love this old house. It's so cozy at night.
column2: 我真的開始愛上這老房子了。晚上很愜意。

column1: Mom's done a great job improving the place.
column2: 媽媽把這裡改建得很棒。

column1: Ahh... the farm smells great, it reminds me of the mountains near my parent's house.
column2: 啊……農場很好聞，讓我想起我爸媽房子旁邊的山脈。

column1: With a little planning, we could automate most of the farm work and just relax!
column2: 只要稍稍規劃一下，我們就可以讓大部分農事自動進行，我們放鬆就行了！

column1: It's going to be clear tonight... I wonder if the %noun constellation will be visible?
column2: 今晚會是晴空……我在想是否可以看見%noun星座嗎？

column1: Don't worry, I won't mind if you track mud into the house. It's fun to get a little dirty now and then.
column2: 別擔心，如果你把泥巴帶進房子我是不會介意的。偶爾弄髒一下也很有趣。

column1: I never realized the amount of care and planning necessary to run a farm! It's a lot like working in the laboratory.
column2: 我從來沒意識到管理一個農場需要多少精力和規劃！簡直就像是實驗室的工作。

column1: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today? Kids need playtime in order reach their full potential.
column2: 你今天有花時間陪%kid1玩耍嗎？孩子們需要遊戲時間才能充分發揮潛力。

column1: What do you think... will %kid1 grow up to be a farmer? Or an engineer?
column2: 你覺得……%kid1將來會不會成為一名農夫呢？或者一名工程師？

column1: I have high hopes for our child. I've been reading all the scientific data on the best ways to raise children.
column2: 我對我們的孩子寄予厚望。我一直在看關於撫養小孩最佳方法的科學資料。

column1: My own workshop, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. Life is pretty good.
column2: 我自己的工作間，兩個很棒的孩子還有一方美麗的土地。生活真美好。

column1: Now that we live together, it's hard to imagine being alone again.
column2: 既然我們住在一起了，那就很難再想像一個人的生活了。

column1: Taking a break? That's good!
column2: 在休息嗎？很好呀！

column1: There's a lot of strategy to planning and running a farm. It's more intellectually stimulating than I thought!
column2: 規劃和管理農場時需要考慮很多方面。這比我想的更加費腦！

column1: For a while there I was considering building a robotic husband. But you're a lot more fun!
column2: 我曾經考慮過造一個機器老公。但是你更有趣！

column1: For a while there I was considering building a robotic wife. But you're a lot more fun!
column2: 我曾經考慮過造一個機器老婆。但是你更有趣！

column1: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. This is a very rare specimen!
column2: 我剛剛在欣賞我的婚禮護身符呢……這貝殼完美無瑕。這是很罕見的標本。

column1: Last night, I had a dream that I was looking through a gigantic telescope. I saw something moving in the %noun nebula. Kind of spooky.
column2: 昨晚，我夢到我使用一架巨大的望遠鏡。我看見%noun星雲裡面有東西在移動。有點嚇人。

column1: I hope you'd still like me even if I gained weight.
column2: 我希望即使我長胖了你還是會喜歡我。

column1: I feel uninspired today.
column2: 我今天沒有靈感……

column1: I think I'll visit my parents today. I haven't seen them in a while.
column2: 我想我今天會去看看我的父母。我有一段時間沒見過他們了。

column1: Mom and Dad are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
column2: 媽媽和爸爸都很好。他們的日常生活還是那樣，即使是在我走之後。今天過得怎麼樣？

column1: So, what's your strategy for optimizing the farm this year?
column2: 那麼你今天完善農場的策略是什麼？

column1: It's wonderful to see all the plants and animals come back to life during the spring.
column2: 春天看到萬物復甦的感覺真棒。

column1: If my brother wasn't such a hermit I'd invite him over for dinner sometime.
column2: 我有時想邀請我哥哥共進晚餐，可是他不願出門。

column1: I wonder if my brother will ever have the courage to ask Abigail out?
column2: 不知道我哥哥是否有勇氣邀請阿比蓋爾出去？

column1: I like to catalogue the different insects I see in summer.
column2: 我喜歡把夏天看到的不同昆蟲分類。

column1: With every season, a new section of the night sky becomes prominent. It's fascinating to witness.
column2: 在每個季節，夜空中都有一片新的部分變得愈發明顯。見證這一幕令人陶醉。

column1: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.
column2: 冬天近在眼前。我們需要再次檢查一下供暖系統，關掉水閥，查看房間所有的保溫層。

column1: Don't worry, dear. I'll take care of it all.
column2: 親愛的，別擔心。我會照料好一切的。

column1: Fall aways reminds me of going out woodcutting with my mom... it might be that smell of freshly cut wood and sap.
column2: 秋天總是讓我想起和媽媽出去伐木的時候……可能是因為新伐木材和汁液的味道吧。

column1: The winters have been disturbingly mild lately.
column2: 近來，冬天簡直溫和得令人不安。

column1: I hope Dad's doing okay... he can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.
column2: 我希望我爸爸最近過得還好……因為出門的機會少，他在冬天的時候會抑鬱。

column1: So, what are your plans for maintaining our income this winter?
column2: 那麼，這個冬天你打算如何維持我們的收益呢？

column1: You could do some fishing or foraging...
column2: 你可以釣魚或去野外採集……

column1: If you do any mining, promise me you'll be careful.
column2: 如果你打算採礦，答應我要多加小心。

column1: I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!
column2: 新的一年耕種開始了，我好興奮啊，@！

column1: The evenings are so warm, it's really the best time of year for stargazing. Who knows what might up there?
column2: 晚上好暖和，這真是一年中最適合觀星的時期！誰知道這裡會出現什麼呢？

column1: The farm life is great, but I'm glad I still work at the clinic... It's an important service for the community.
column2: 農場生活太棒啦，但我很高興我還在診所工作……醫療服務對社區來說至關重要。

column1: I'm really looking forward to having rhubarb pie in the spring. Oh... that tang, that zest!
column2: 春天我十分期待大黃派呢。噢……那氣味，那味道！

column1: I got up early to do a little stargazing.
column2: 今天我提早起來看了會星星。

column1: I hope you don't mind if I spend some time on my projects today, honey.
column2: 寶貝，我今天要去做我的專案，希望你不會介意。
